name: Breakout: Revenge
description:
Made as a part of Weekly Game Jam

 - Week 50 'Remake a Classic'

Campaign: Take revenge on your brick brethren

     Move left and right with either the 

          arrow keys or A/D

     Take all of the paddle's lives to win

Versus: A traitor lives among us

     Player 1 moves up and down with W/S

     Player 2 moves up and down with 

          arrow keys

     First to 5 points wins

This was my first game jam and it was a great experience.

I hope you enjoy ;]
